definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: fit together, fit out, si vera l. (Sir 43:8 id. Pi. pave (fig.; si vera l.); As. raṣâpu, join together, build; Ar. ras.afa join together, cf. DHM:VOJ i. 30, Sab. [[רחף]], [[רחפם]] Id:ib. Hal:JAS, 1872, Juin, 534; Aram. [[רְחַף]], rs.ap, arrange in a line; cf. Aram. [[רִחְפְּתָא]], rs.opo0, NH [[רְחְפָה]], all = pavement);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. [[תּוֹכוֹ רָחוּף אַהֲבָה]] Ct So 3:10 its interior fitted out(?) with love (Gr al. [[הָבְנִי]] ebony).
